metadata.Title: CVE-2021-41556 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.Description: sqclass.cpp in Squirrel through 2.2.5 and 3.x through 3.1 allows anout-of-bounds read (in the core interpreter) that can lead to CodeExecution. If a victim executes an attacker-controlled squirrel script, itis possible for the attacker to break out of the squirrel script sandboxeven if all dangerous functionality such as File System functions has beendisabled. An attacker might abuse this bug to target (for example) Cloudservices that allow customization via SquirrelScripts, or distributemalware through video games that embed a Squirrel Engine.

criterions.comment: squirrel3 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
